name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 3
summary:
An exciting season pass that includes 4 additional playable characters, stages and season 3 pass bonus character colors as additional DLC for the Guilty Gear -Strive- game.

Season Pass 3 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and 2 color packs for the new characters. The first pack unlocks 6 color variations, including the ultimate edition colors, and the second unlocks 3 color variations that are exclusive to the Season Pass.
